name: umc-week0-erd-system
description: High-quality ERD auto-rendering system with Mermaid

scripts.render: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); const path = require('path'); const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const files = fs.readdirSync('docs/erd').filter(f => f.endsWith('.md')); files.forEach(file => { const base = path.basename(file, '.md'); console.log(`Rendering ${file}...`); try { execSync(`npx mmdc -i docs/erd/${file} -o docs/erd/temp.svg`, {stdio:'inherit'}); execSync(`mv docs/erd/temp-1.svg docs/erd/${base}.svg`, {stdio:'inherit'}); } catch(e) {} try { execSync(`npx mmdc -i docs/erd/${file} -o docs/erd/temp.png --scale 3`, {stdio:'inherit'}); execSync(`mv docs/erd/temp-1.png docs/erd/${base}.png`, {stdio:'inherit'}); } catch(e) {} console.log(`âœ… Generated ${base}.svg and ${base}.png`); });"

author: UMC 9th Spring Sweetheart
